text:
Club Dread (also known as Broken Lizard's Club Dread) is a 2004 American horror comedy film directed by Jay Chandrasekhar and written by and starring the comedy troupe Broken Lizard—Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Steve Lemme, Paul Soter, and Erik Stolhanske. Brittany Daniel, Bill Paxton, and Jordan Ladd play supporting roles.
Though the story is set on an island in Costa Rica, filming took place in Mexico.
